name: Ninjaguiden (The Ninja Guide)
description:
Ninjaguiden means "The Ninja Guide" in Swedish. While the guidebook is in Swedish, anyone can become a ninja by following these ancient wisdoms.

Are other people encroaching on your way of life? Are you being pestered by noisy neighbors, annoying people or are you in any other kind of bad situation? Take control of your own life in the way of the ninja!

Get through five chapters of The Ninja Guide to become a true ninja! You will learn to master all aspects of shinobi and ninjutsu in no time!

Ninjaguiden was made during two days for the Gamerella 2014 gamejam in Montreal.
